message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO. 

The paper proposes a deep learning approach for crowd segmentation, which is a computer vision problem. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves the use of fully convolutional neural networks (FCNN), which is a type of deep learning architecture, and the optimization of appearance and motion filters, which are machine learning techniques. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.MM (Multimedia) are also likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper mentions the use of the proposed approach for general image segmentation problems, which could fall under cs.RO (Robotics and Control).
